claim: Recombinant technology leads to a broader immune response that may provide cross-protection, even in a mismatch season.
explanation: The image shows the header of a CDC Morbidity and Mortality Weekly Report (MMWR) Recommendations and Reports, including the title, volume (71), issue number (No. 1), and publication date (August 26, 2022). The image only displays the document header and contains no data or discussion about recombinant technology or immune responses, and therefore does not support the claim. Note: No figure content or study data is present in the image; only publication metadata is shown.
